bike.description: Fuji A6-SL custom-butted alloy, integrated 1 1/2" lower head tube, oversized 34.9mm seat tube & PIIS BB86 shell, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: Fuji A6-SL alloy chainstays, forged-road dropout w/ replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: FC-770 carbon fork blades, w/ tapered alloy steerer
Shimano Ultegra STI shifter/brake combo, Flight Deck-compatible, 20-speed
Oval 327 aero alloy clincher, 20/24H precision road hubs, stainless bladed spokes
Vittoria Zaffiro Pro Slick, 60 tpi, 700c x 23mm, folding
FSA Orbit C-40, 1 1/8" upper - 1 1/2" lower, integrated
Oval R500 w/ CrMo hollow rails
